de.unisiegen.tpml.core.prettyprinter
Class PrettyStringBuilderFactory

java.lang.Object
  de.unisiegen.tpml.core.prettyprinter.PrettyStringBuilderFactory

public final class PrettyStringBuilderFactory
extends Object

Factory class for PrettyStringBuilders. Use this class to allocate new pretty string builders, which in turn are used to generate new PrettyStrings.

Version:
$Rev: 277 $
Author:
Benedikt Meurer
See Also:
PrettyString, PrettyStringBuilder

Method Summary
 PrettyStringBuilder newBuilder(PrettyPrintable printable, int returnPriority)
          Allocates a new PrettyStringBuilder, which will generate an annotation for the printable for the whole string represented by the builder.
static PrettyStringBuilderFactory newInstance()
          Allocates a new PrettyStringBuilderFactory, which can be used to allocate new PrettyStringBuilders.

Method Detail

newInstance

public static PrettyStringBuilderFactory newInstance()
Allocates a new PrettyStringBuilderFactory, which can be used to allocate new PrettyStringBuilders.

Returns:
a newly allocated PrettyStringBuilderFactory instance.
See Also:
#newBuilder()

newBuilder

public PrettyStringBuilder newBuilder(PrettyPrintable printable,
                                      int returnPriority)
Allocates a new PrettyStringBuilder, which will generate an annotation for the printable for the whole string represented by the builder.

Parameters:
printable - the printable object.
returnPriority - the return priority according to the priority grammar used for the printables in this builder.
Returns:
a newly allocated PrettyStringBuilder for the printable with the specified returnPriority.
Throws:
NullPointerException - if printable is null.
See Also:
PrettyString, PrettyStringBuilder
